article:
My favorite month is May, because there are many events   in this month. May 1
is Labor Day . We have a three-day holiday  . We can have a trip. We have an Art Festival on May 8
in our school. We like it very much,we like to show our pictures. May 12
is my good friend Linda's birthday. We have a big birthday party for her . On May 20
, we have an English party. We often have
in the evening. We have a book sale in our classroom on May 28
. It's very interesting.
